alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Magoffin; Martin; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 28 at 9:39PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Martin, east central Morgan, Johnson and northeastern Magoffin Counties through 1030 PM EST... At 939 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tella, or near Salyersville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hargis, Niles, Win, Oil Springs, Ballot, Elna and Conley around 945 PM EST. Barnetts Creek, Patrick, Leander, Flatgap, Dobson, Swamp Branch, Redbush, Riceville and Barnrock around 950 PM EST. Paintsville, Staffordsville, Wittensville, Nippa, Thealka, Stambaugh, Galen, Hagerhill, Collista and Fitz around 955 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Offutt, River, Tutor Key, Bobbs, Williamsport, Boons Camp, Thelma, Wells Chapel, Perston Estates, Woodland Estates, Whitehouse, Chestnut, Tomahawk, Stidham, Pevier, Debord, Wells, Davisport, Delong, Add, Milo, Davella, Inez, Andy, Bradbury, Lovely, Calf Creek, Preece, Job, Prince, Coalpoint, McClure, Warfield, Hode, Beauty, Oppy and Pilgrim. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
